description: Defines a React functional component 'ProductTable' that renders a table of products with options to edit and delete each product. It displays product details such as name, category, price, and stock, and handles empty product lists gracefully.

methods.name: ProductTable({ products, onEdit, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a table of products with edit and delete actions.

ctags.name: ProductTable
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ProductTable({ products, onEdit, onDelete }) {$/
